mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.nick_name nickName, u.pic_id picId, COUNT(b.id) articleCount, COALESCE(SUM(b.click_count), 0) clickCount, COALESCE(SUM(b.like_count), 0) likeCount, CASE WHEN COALESCE(SUM(f.id), 0) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isFollow, count(distinct f1.id) followerCount, count(distinct f2.id) followingCount FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_article b ON u.id = b.author AND b.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN t_follow f ON u.id = f.target_user_id AND f.user_id = #{loginUserId} AND f.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN t_follow f1 ON u.id = f1.target_user_id AND f1.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN t_follow f2 ON u.id = f2.user_id AND f2.STATUS = 1 WHERE u.STATUS = 1 AND u.id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user set password = #{newPassword} WHERE status = 1 AND username = #{username}
